content: blue ribbon round ripple dishcloth by julee a reeves finished size smaller dish cloth- approx 9 3/4 larger dish cloth- approx 10 3/4 from point to point *page 1* materials approx 2 ozs worsted weight cotton yarn g crochet hook tapestry needle a little bit of time special stitches popcorn double_crochet in indicated space 5 times take hook out of loop and insert into first double_crochet made then back into the dropped loop pull the loop through the first double_crochet shell 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in indicated space gauge first 3 rnds of pattern with popcorcn center = 3 this would also be a great starter for a round ripple afghan just continue in the same pattern for as big as you would like it to be for a flat center round 1 ch5 double_crochet
